title: What is the relationship between learning and technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Learning and technology are made for each other. We can learn technology or learn through technology. Both are interconnected. In learning technology, there is a lot to learn. Technology is evolving. Every gadget has its own importance and features. We can learn technology to know about them or to understand the existing technology and modernise them. In learning through technology, these days children are being taught their syllabus through the means of technology which helps them to understand keenly. Which helps the younger generation to come up with new ideas and inventions which intern develops the technology.
